MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-APR-2021 02:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL71 postcode area of Llannerch-y-Medd, affecting properties in Llannerch-y-Medd and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 02:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:46PM on 23rd April 2021.?
